summary: This document is an Amazon.com order confirmation email sent to Ghislaine Maxwell on March 21, 2005. It shows a purchase shipped to her New York address, providing evidence of her residence and commercial activity at that time.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email order confirmation is addressed to Ghislaine Maxwell, showing her email address and shipping/billing addresses in New York.

events.title: Amazon purchase by Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell placed an order on Amazon.com totaling $29.94 with one-day shipping scheduled for delivery.

events.title: Scheduled delivery of Amazon order
events.description: The Amazon order was scheduled to be delivered on March 24, 2005, with one-day shipping.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was actively using an Amazon.com account in March 2005.
The document confirms Maxwell's residence in New York City (10022 and 10021 zip codes) in 2005.
The order was placed on March 21, 2005, with one-day shipping scheduled for March 24, 2005.
The order total was $29.94, showing routine commercial activity.
This document provides digital evidence of Maxwell's presence and activities in New York during the period when Epstein was active.
